Comulate - Senior Engineer (3+ YoE) - ONSITE in San Francisco, CA We're building automation software for the insurance industry, accelerated by AI. Our product has caused customers to literally cry tears of joy. Seed stage in terms of headcount (< 20 people) but Series B in terms of business traction (+ cash-flow positive). Experienced, high-caliber, eng team from Airbnb, Asana, Brex, AWS, and LiveRamp. Building a product-focused eng culture in which engineers work directly with customers. Stack is full-stack TypeScript, Postgres, React, GraphQL, and Next.js.

We're intentionally under the radar - we focus instead on delivering for customers and building a category-defining company.
